full_text:
Re: Reuters: Prison Guards Skipped Mandatory Checks Before Epstein Death
From
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
(OAG)
To
Hugh HurwitzRay Ormond
Date
2019/08/11 09:29
Subject:
Re: Reuters: Prison Guards Skipped Mandatory Checks Before Epstein Death
Attachments:
TEXT.htm, Mime.822
Gentlemen. Do you have time for a quick update call before I leave for my trip with the AG?
Does 12 noon work?  If there is something new and pressing, we can do a call earlier.
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
On Aug 10, 2019, at 10:20 PM, Hugh Hurwitz(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
@bop.gov> wrote:
How do they have this info? Unbelievable.
https://www.breitbart.com/politics/2019/08/10/report-prison-guards-skipped-mandatory-checks-before-jeffrey-epsteins-death/
Hugh
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing the Epstein death and related news reports. Some names and email addresses are redacted.
